name: addedlines
description: Number of lines added in this file by this commit (only in this file, not the whole commit).

name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in sortinhat profile.

name: committer
description: Commiter name as it appears in commit (including e-mail).

name: committer_date
description: Date when commiter made this commit.

name: file_dir_name
description: Path in which the file is located, not including file name.

name: fileaction
description: action performed by the commit over the file.

name: files
description: number of files touched by the same commit this file is included in.

name: filetype
description: Code or Other, based on file extension.

name: git_author_domain
description: Domain extracted from author email included within the commit, if any.

name: message.keyword
description: Commit message as a single String.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: owner
description: Owner (code author) name as it appears in commit (including e-mail).

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy)

name: removedlines
description: Number of lines removed in this file by this commit (only in this file, not the whole commit).
